Abyss Of War.mStory: War has ruled and will rule forever

Atrium of Death.mStory: The Only Zone of Hell the devil also fears

Belly of Gluttony.mStory: The hunger of doing nothing but eating drags the soul of the damned here

Brothel of Lust.mStory: Whether it is lust of the flesh or of power, you would give in to your temptations here

Manacles of Pestilence.mStory: The only way out is in a hospital stretcher

Matrix of Greed.mStory: If you are tempted by greed, you are not fit to be in this region

Realm of Famine.mStory: The kingdom of starvation has begun

Underworld.mStory: The beginning and the end of the labyrinth of hell

BELLY OF GLUTTONY PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Belly of Gluttony and Underworld

LEVIATHAN.mBlockStory: The shield blocks the Leviathan's venomous teeth
LEVIATHAN.mEndStory: It Crawl backs into Purgatory, dissapointed and sad, leaving behind something very valuable
LEVIATHAN.mStory: The infamous demon banished to the depths of Purgatory
LEVIATHAN.mUpdateStory: Tries to bite into your skin with its razor sharp teeth

PATHWAY TO PURGATORY.mStory: Try to beat the monster from the deepest depths of hell

PINK RING.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of Gluttony

ANSWER ROUTE.mStory: If you have a good IQ you may pass

BIO-WEAPON FACTORY.mEndStory: The beak mask protects you from the effects of the chemicals
BIO-WEAPON FACTORY.mStory: This chemical testing facility can kill almost anyone
BIO-WEAPON FACTORY.mUpdateStory: The strong chemicals creep up on you

DISEASE ROUTE.mStory: Only take this route if you have a good immune system

FUMING PATH.mStory: Fumes of pungent chemicals are creeping out

Chemical Testing Room.mStory: The deadliest weapons of mass destructions are tested here

BROTHEL OF LUST PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Brothel of Lust and Underworld

WHAT DO YOU DESIRE?.mEndStory: Chose your door carefully as your path depends on your lust
WHAT DO YOU DESIRE?.mStory: Play to unlock doors to your lust and temptation

Desire Room.mStory: Fullfill your every desire by picking your lust

BELLY OF GLUTTONY PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Belly of Gluttony and Underworld

BLOB MELTOR.mStory: The only weapon capable of melting the pig blob demon.

DELICIOUS MOUTH WATERING FOOD.mEndStory: You feel full and bloated but you now have a desire to eat everything
DELICIOUS MOUTH WATERING FOOD.mStory: Eating this would never fullfill your desire, or will it?

FEAST TABLE.mEndStory: Moving the table revealed a special artifact that might be useful
FEAST TABLE.mStory: The demons have their glutonous feast of human flesh on this table
FEAST TABLE.mUpdateStory: Feels as if something is pushing to get out from beneath the table

TO THE BLOB.mStory: The path seems to be covered with nothing but vomit and slime

Feast Room.mStory: The demons of hell feast of the flesh of all the souls in hell here

ENTRY TO DROUGHT.mStory: The only way to get to famine

REALM OF FAMINE PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Realm of Famine and Underworld

STARVING AND THIRSTY PEOPLE.mEndStory: Elixir quenched their thirst and they opened the gateway
STARVING AND THIRSTY PEOPLE.mUpdateStory: Can't open the gateway without quenching our thirst

Gates of Starvation.mStory: The only way out is by feeding the needy

ABYSS OF WAR PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Abyss Of War and Underworld

ATRIUM OF DEATH PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Atrium of Death and Underworld

BELLY OF GLUTTONY PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Belly of Gluttony and Underworld

BROTHEL OF LUST PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Brothel of Lust and Underworld

LUCIFER MORNINGSTAR.mBlockStory: The shield protects you from the devil's stare
LUCIFER MORNINGSTAR.mEndStory: The devil frowns and returns to the depths of hell planning and plotting his next return
LUCIFER MORNINGSTAR.mStory: The devil himself, guarding the gates of hell
LUCIFER MORNINGSTAR.mUpdateStory: Stares deep into your soul, killing your strength from within

MANACLES OF PESTILENCE PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Manacles of Pestilence and Underworld

MATRIX OF GREED PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Matrix of Greed and Underworld

REALM OF FAMINE PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Realm of Famine and Underworld

THE GATES OF HELL.mEndStory: You have successfully sealed the gates of hell and stopped the apocalypse
THE GATES OF HELL.mStory: Apocalypse is upon us as the seals are broken and the gate is open
THE GATES OF HELL.mUpdateStory: The devil is angry and is going to stop you from stopping the apocalypse

Hell's Gates.mStory: The start and the stop of the apocalypse

DEPTHS OF TARTARUS.mStory: Feels like going deeper into hell

HELLFIRE DEMON.mBlockStory: The shield protects you from the effects of hell fire
HELLFIRE DEMON.mEndStory: Its head comes off and it sheds its skin
HELLFIRE DEMON.mStory: Came from the deepest underworld to burn souls
HELLFIRE DEMON.mUpdateStory: Tries to burn your soul with hell fire

Lair of Fire.mStory: Here lives the demon of hell fire

ATRIUM OF DEATH PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Atrium of Death and Underworld

CLOAK OF LIGHT.mStory: Brings light to the darkest of places

PROTON PACK.mStory: Only weapon strong enough to take down ghosts

THE CARPET OF DEAD SOULS.mStory: Made with the flesh of all the reaped souls
THE CARPET OF DEAD SOULS.mUpdateStory: Something below is disshaping the carpet

Land of the Living.mStory: Only the living shall reside here

ENTRY TO DROUGHT.mStory: The only way to get to famine

Maze of Drought Entry.mStory: The destruction of famine has begun

Maze of Undead 2.mStory: There is a sudden increase in eerieness

GHOST OF NIGHT CRAWLER.mBlockStory: The shield creates an impenetrable force field around you
GHOST OF NIGHT CRAWLER.mEndStory: The ghost vanishes into thin air
GHOST OF NIGHT CRAWLER.mStory: Notorious Killer and a worse ghost
GHOST OF NIGHT CRAWLER.mUpdateStory: Tries to take your living body

PIT OF DARKNESS.mEndStory: The light from your cloak brings you back and lights up the place
PIT OF DARKNESS.mStory: You see nothing but darkness and hear the burning souls of the damned
PIT OF DARKNESS.mUpdateStory: The darkness takes you deeper into the pit of oblivion

ELIXIR OF THIRST.mStory: Quenches any kind of thirst or bloodlust

PATHWAY TO PURGATORY.mStory: Try to beat the monster from the deepest depths of hell

PIG BLOB.mBlockStory: The shield pushes the demon aside
PIG BLOB.mEndStory: The demon melts until there is nothing but slime left
PIG BLOB.mUpdateStory: Tries to swallow you as a whole

TO THE BLOB.mStory: The path seems to be covered with nothing but vomit and slime

ABYSS OF WAR PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Abyss Of War and Underworld

PATH TO WAR.mStory: Only the daring can challenge war

RED HORSEMAN.mBlockStory: The shield teleports you back to war's realm
RED HORSEMAN.mEndStory: Climbs the red horse and gallops back to where it came from, leaving behind something extremely valuable
RED HORSEMAN.mStory: War, Loves to battle for supremacy
RED HORSEMAN.mUpdateStory: Tries to blast you into oblivion

ANSWER ROUTE.mStory: If you have a good IQ you may pass

IQ TO PESTILENCE.mStory: You have defeated pestilence in theory now time to defeat her in reality

THE BLACK DEATH.mEndStory: The black death was pestilence's masterpiece
THE BLACK DEATH.mStory: Sit down gather round and listen to my tale. Of A Time when humanity would fail. To conquer death like it always had. We have died before but this time was bad. In threes they came spreading like plague. We know many died but the numbers are vague

Riddle Room.mStory: Are you a know it all? Try to get out of this riddle

GOLD RING.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of Greed

MATRIX OF GREED PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Matrix of Greed and Underworld

THE GREEDY MIDAS.mBlockStory: The shield blocks his attempted entrapment
THE GREEDY MIDAS.mEndStory: Pretty disappointed, Midas runs away like the coward he is, leaving behind his prized possession
THE GREEDY MIDAS.mStory: The ruler of the matrix of greed and all powerful gold master
THE GREEDY MIDAS.mUpdateStory: Tries to turn you into one of his prized gold trophies

DEMON OF MONEY.mEndStory: You didn't give in to your lust. Demon lets you pass
DEMON OF MONEY.mStory: Can't stand the sight of you, will attack you

DEMON OF POWER.mEndStory: You didn't give in to your lust. Demon lets you pass
DEMON OF POWER.mStory: Threatened by you, will attack you
DEMON OF POWER.mUpdateStory: Sees your wand and attacks you with all its power

BEAK MASK.mStory: The only proper protection from the cruelty of pestilence

FUMING PATH.mStory: Fumes of pungent chemicals are creeping out

MANACLES OF PESTILENCE PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Manacles of Pestilence and Underworld

PECULIAR MEDICINAL INJECTION.mStory: Bring back from the dead or send back to death

Room of Protection.mStory: A sheltor from the upcoming plague

DEPTHS OF TARTARUS.mStory: Feels like going deeper into hell

NUCLEAR DEATH PASSAGE.mStory: Those who wish to see radioactivity may go this way

PATH TO WAR.mStory: Only the daring can challenge war

SWARM OF DEMONS.mEndStory: Your fire demon disguise fools these dumb demons and they get back to partying unaware of their impending doom
SWARM OF DEMONS.mStory: Looks like all the demons are partying into the Apocalypse
SWARM OF DEMONS.mUpdateStory: You are not a demon, they surround you from all directions and try to kill you

WORLD DEATH PASSAGE.mStory: Those who dare may walk this path

Tartarus.mStory: Demons of hell have risen to party

MIRROR OF ERISED.mBlockStory: The shield protects you from the mirror's voodoo
MIRROR OF ERISED.mEndStory: The mirror breaks into millions of pieces unlocking doorways
MIRROR OF ERISED.mStory: The most powerful demon of greed and desire
MIRROR OF ERISED.mUpdateStory: Tries to ensnare you with visions of great achievements and desires

GOLD SLOT MACHINE.mEndStory: You are a greedy human being and you get nothing
GOLD SLOT MACHINE.mStory: Lots of winnings would give you gold
GOLD SLOT MACHINE.mUpdateStory: Play me to be a gold master

MATRIX OF GREED PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Matrix of Greed and Underworld

MONEY SLOT MACHINE.mEndStory: You are a greedy human being and you get nothing
MONEY SLOT MACHINE.mStory: Lots of winnings would make you rich
MONEY SLOT MACHINE.mUpdateStory: Play me to get more money than god

OPERATOR.mEndStory: The operator accepts the gold coin as a valid offering and opens doorways
OPERATOR.mStory: Provides entry into the Matrix of Greed
OPERATOR.mUpdateStory: Needs something in order to give you passage

POOR SLOT MACHINE.mEndStory: The slot machine throws out a gold coin
POOR SLOT MACHINE.mStory: You may win a lot you may lose a lot
POOR SLOT MACHINE.mUpdateStory: Play me to test your luck

POWER SLOT MACHINE.mEndStory: You are a greedy human being and you get nothing
POWER SLOT MACHINE.mStory: Lots of winnings would make you a tyrant
POWER SLOT MACHINE.mUpdateStory: Play me to rule the world

ABYSS OF WAR PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Abyss Of War and Underworld

War Memorial.mStory: All the trinkets that war has collected over the years

WORLD DEATH PASSAGE.mStory: Those who dare may walk this path

WORLD WAR III.mStory: The Nazis are back and the Allies can't defeat them all
WORLD WAR III.mUpdateStory: More than a 1000 zombie nazis attack you from all directions

DAMNED SWORD.mStory: The sword of Ares, a demon killing machine

GOLD COIN.mStory: Shiny object that can get you places

MIDAS HAMMER.mStory: Made of gold, only thing powerful to break the temptation of greed

RED RING.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of War

SHIELD OF INVINCIBILITY.mStory: An unbreakable protection from almost all hellish attacks

mStory: The Apocalypse is upon us. The Seven Seals of Hell have been opened and the Gates of Hell have unleashed all kinds of demons into the world. Save us, Oh! Mighty Hero by going into the depths of hell and fighting the worst of the worst to seal the gates again and stop the apocalypse.
